# Object-oriented Noughts and Crosses Game

## Description

Noughts and Crosses, commonly known as Tic Tac Toe, is a 2-player board game played on a 3x3 grid. Players take turns marking a space. The first player to mark 3 spaces in a row wins.

### Nouns and verbs

**Nouns**
- game
  - board (grid)
    - space
      - player (mark)
  - players (list)
    - player

**Verbs**
- mark_space
- determine_win (row or diagonal of player marks)

### CRC Cards

Formalize objects and associate verbs with nouns.

- [View CRC Cards - interactive](https://echeung.me/crcmaker/?)
- [View CRC Cards](crc_cards.pdf)
